Item Description 2016 Gibson Les Paul Studio Faded HP Electric Guitar in very good condition with only a couple light scratches and small dings on the front and back. The protective plastic is still on the pickguard. Classic Satin Worn Brown finish on the maple top, sides, back and neck. The guitar has a nice action and the rounded profile mahogany neck with a wider Soloist neck width gives the neck the right mix of rounded '50s and slim taper 60's. With the fast access heel, rounded Soloist neck profile and adjustable titanium nut, this neck has a great fast feel. The frets are in excellent condition.The Burstbucker Pro pickups have a great vintage PAF tone with good output. The guitar is equipped with an ABR bridge with a stop bar tailpiece. The original automated tuners have been replaced with Grover tuners. Looks, plays and sounds great with modern features and a cool vintage vibe. Includes the original Gibson padded gig bag, paperwork and picture at final inspection. Made in the USA. Serial Number: 160087944 Weight: 8 lbs. 3 oz. OVERVIEW A rounded neck and a list of high performance features. The Gibson Les Paul Studio Faded 2016 HP is a great looking variation on one of the most-played guitars in the world. You have the classic combination of a maple top over a chambered mahogany body, a rounded neck profile with a wider Soloist neck width, and two screaming Burstbucker Pro humbucking pickups. A Plek Pro fret treatment ensures precise playability, intonation, and tone. The Les Paul Studio Faded 2016 HP is a performing guitarist's dream come true. Gibson Les Paul Studio Faded 2016 HP Features: Maple top over a chambered mahogany body Modern weight-relieved mahogany body reduces weight while maintaining sustain Wider Soloist neck width Fast-access heel improves access to upper frets Adjustable titanium zero-fret nut allows you to fine-tune your action Dual Burstbucker Pro humbucking pickups for that classic Les Paul sound Mother of pearl inlays SPECIFICATIONSBody Body shape: Single cutaway Body type: Solid body Body material: Solid wood Top wood: Maple Body wood: Mahogany Body finish: Satin Orientation: Right handedNeck Neck shape: Rounded Neck wood: Mahogany Joint: Set-in Scale length: 24.75" Truss rod: Standard Neck finish: SatinFretboard Radius: 12" Fret size: Medium jumbo Number of frets: 22 Inlays: Trapezoid Nut width: 1.75" (44.45mm)Pickups Configuration: HH Neck: BurstBucker Pro Middle: Not applicable Bridge: BurstBucker Pro Brand: Gibson Active or passive pickups: Passive Series or parallel: Series Piezo: No Active EQ: No Special electronics: NoneControls Control layout: Volume 1, volume 2, tone 1, tone 2 Pickup switch: Not applicable Coil tap or split: No Kill switch: NoHardware Bridge type: Fixed Bridge design: Tune-o-matic Tailpiece: Stopbar Tuning machines: Grover Color: ChromeOther Number of strings: 6-string Special features: Neck width, Neck Heel contour, Pickups Case: Gig bag Country of origin: United States About Us Payment Shipping Terms Returns About UsWe offer a large selection of quality pre-owned musical instruments and equipment from the industries finest manufactures including Akai, Ampeg, Boss, Denon, Digidesign, DigiTech, Epiphone, Fender, Gibson, Gretsch, Guild, Ibanez, Korg, Lexicon, Line 6, Mackie, Mesa Boogie, Marshall, Martin, MusicMan, MXR, Neumann, Peavey, Pioneer, PRS, Roland, Shure, Tascam, Taylor, TC Electronic and Yamaha.
